title: 2  Simulations and real-world experiments
text:
2.1 Results
All proposed experiments were successfully conducted. The first experiment [Figure 2.2] showed that the UWB measurements are indeed precise and do not express any signs of nonlinearity. The maximum range of 120 m was reached by UWB, however, the measurements at the far end are not reliable and often drops out. This can be seen as straight lines in Figure 2.2. Somehow cite this [1]
